title: Fix product images not loading on wishlist, cart, checkout, and order success pages
description: Product images from Cloudinary are not displayed on wishlist, cart, checkout, and order success pages. These pages only show SVG illustrations or fallback emojis. Root cause: CartItem.image stores illustration key strings instead of Cloudinary URLs, and wishlist page ignores imageUrl field entirely.
